title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2529.10 - Pending PAR proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2529.10 - Pending PAR proceedings

State Regulations

Unless undue hardship or prejudice would result
therefrom, this Code shall apply to any PAR proceeding pending before the DHCR
commenced on or after April 1, 1984. Where a provision of this Code is amended, or an applicable statute is enacted or amended during the pendency of a PAR, the determination shall be in accordance with the statute or Code as it existed
at the time the rent administrator's order was issued, unless the relevant law
or regulation states otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2529.10

Amended

New

York State Register November 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 45, eff. 11/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
